fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: ETS, renewables, electricity market design, energy efficiency, self consumption, distributed generation smart cities
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: UNEF is memeber of SolarPower Europe, the European Photovoltaic Industry Association, Global Solar Council, Energy Charter and International Energy Agency.
goals__remit: UNEF is the leading and most representative photovoltaic association in Spain. We represent the whole PV value chain with more than 300 members (R&D, industrial companies, consultancies).
